arn.title: ARN
arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address associated with the account

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the AWS account (e.g., ACTIVE)

joinedTimestamp.title: Joined Timestamp
joinedTimestamp.description: When the account joined the organization

joinedMethod.title: Joined Method
joinedMethod.description: Method used to join the account to the organization

arn.title: ARN
arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket

region.title: Region
region.description: Geographic AWS Region where a bucket is created and stored

creationDate.title: Creation Date
creationDate.description: The date when the bucket was created

instanceType.title: Instance Type
instanceType.description: The type of the EC2 instance (e.g., t2.micro, m5.large)

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the instance

publicIpAddress.title: Public IP Address
publicIpAddress.description: The public IP address of the EC2 instance

privateIpAddress.title: Private IP Address
privateIpAddress.description: The private IP address of the EC2 instance

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the EC2 instance

arn.title: ARN
arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EC2 instance

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the ECS cluster

runningTasksCount.title: Running Tasks Count
runningTasksCount.description: The number of running tasks in the cluster

activeServicesCount.title: Active Services Count
activeServicesCount.description: The number of active services in the cluster

pendingTasksCount.title: Pending Tasks Count
pendingTasksCount.description: The number of pending tasks in the cluster

registeredContainerInstancesCount.title: Reg Container Instances Count
registeredContainerInstancesCount.description: The number of registered container instances in the cluster

capacityProviders.title: Capacity Providers
capacityProviders.description: The capacity providers associated with the cluster

clusterArn.title: ARN
clusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster

arn.title: ARN
arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EKS cluster

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the EKS cluster

version.title: Kubernetes Version
version.description: The Kubernetes version of the EKS cluster

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the EKS cluster

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The endpoint URL for the EKS cluster

roleArn.title: Role ARN
roleArn.description: The IAM role ARN associated with the EKS cluster

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the EKS cluster

serviceName.title: Service Name
serviceName.description: The name of the ECS service

serviceArn.title: ARN
serviceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service

clusterArn.title: Cluster ARN
clusterArn.description: The ARN of the cluster that hosts the service

taskDefinition.title: Task Definition
taskDefinition.description: The ARN of the task definition associated with the service

desiredCount.title: Desired Count
desiredCount.description: The desired number of tasks for the service

runningCount.title: Running Count
runningCount.description: The number of tasks that are currently running

launchType.title: Launch Type
launchType.description: The launch type of the service

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the service
